attributes.title: Lannister Soldier
attributes.actor: Ciaran McMahonA '''Lannister Soldier''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 2
attributes.link: House Lannister:''For other uses see Lannister soldier.''Character

sections.Biography:
===Background===
This soldier is fighting for [[House Lannister]] in the [[War of the Five Kings]].

===[[Season 2]]===
He bumps into [[Arya Stark]] while crossing the courtyard at [[Harrenhal]], making her waste the water she is carrying. He cuffs her round the head and warns her to be more careful.<ref>"[[The Prince of Winterfell]]"</ref>
